long_description: The snow has fallen and the sun is out! Reach for men's REI Winterflyte Mock shirt and go explore your favorite cross-country trails in the comfort of performance fabric and a high, warm collar. Very comfortable blend of polyester and spandex dries quickly and wicks moisture to keep skin dry, offers UPF 50+ sun protection and moves with you thanks to its 4-way stretch. Rear mesh panels along upper back and mesh lining along mock neck enhance breathability and comfort. You'll ski farther without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams that are designed to stay out of the way during motion. Raglan sleeves enhance range of motion. Thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over top of hands for warmth. The men's REI Winterflyte Mock Neck shirt features an active fit that provides a full range of motion. Reflective details enhance visibility in dim light.
short_description: The snow has fallen and the sun is out! Reach for men's REI Winterflyte Mock shirt and go explore your favorite cross-country trails in the comfort of performance fabric and a high, warm collar.
